scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && REACT_APP_BACKEND_TARGET=http://localhost:3001 yarn start" "cd frontend && REACT_APP_BACKEND_TARGET=http://localhost:3002 yarn start" "cd backend && PORT=3001 yarn start:watch" "cd backend && PORT=3002 yarn start:watch"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && PORT=3000 REACT_APP_BACKEND_TARGET=http://localhost:3002 yarn start" "cd frontend && PORT=3001 REACT_APP_BACKEND_TARGET=http://localhost:3002 yarn start" "cd backend && PORT=3002 yarn start:watch"
